ext_signal.name: CASTOR_HaloMuon.v0
ext_signal.description: At least 1 CASTOR phi-sector with low but constant energy deposit along z
ext_signal.label: CASTOR R GT4

ext_signal.name: BPTX_plus.v0
ext_signal.description: beam1

ext_signal.name: BPTX_minus.v0
ext_signal.description: beam2

ext_signal.name: BSC_minBias_inner_threshold1.v0
ext_signal.description: BSC minbias: hits +z side >= 1 and hits -z side >= 1 (inner segments only)

ext_signal.name: BSC_minBias_inner_threshold2.v0
ext_signal.description: BSC minbias: hits +z side >= 2 and hits -z side >= 2 (inner segments only)

ext_signal.name: BSC_minBias_OR.v0
ext_signal.description: BSC OR: there is at least one hit, anywhere in the BSC

ext_signal.name: BSC_HighMultiplicity.v0
ext_signal.description: BSC high multiplicity: all segments fire on both sides in coincidence (Before June 1, 2010, only inner segments were required)

ext_signal.name: ZDC_Scint_itght_vertex.v0
ext_signal.description: ZDC tight vertex: TAN scintillators fire within 5 ns of each other

ext_signal.name: ZDC_Scint_loose_vertex.v0
ext_signal.description: ZDC loose vertex: TAN scintillators fire within 15 ns of each other

ext_signal.name: ZDC_Scint_plus.v0
ext_signal.description: ZDC+ TAN scintillator signal over threshold

ext_signal.name: ZDC_Scint_minus.v0
ext_signal.description: ZDC- TAN scintillator signal over threshold

ext_signal.name: BSC_minBias_threshold1.v0
ext_signal.description: BSC minbias: hits +z side >= 1 and hits -z side >= 1 (all segments: inner rings, outer petals)

ext_signal.name: BSC_minBias_threshold2.v0
ext_signal.description: BSC minbias: hits +z side >= 2 and hits -z side >= 2 (all segments: inner rings, outer petals)

ext_signal.name: BSC_splash_beam1.v0
ext_signal.description: BSC splash trigger: beam 1, threshold = 2; inner ring hits on -z side >= 2

ext_signal.name: BSC_splash_beam2.v0
ext_signal.description: BSC splash trigger: beam 2, threshold = 2; inner ring hits on +z side >= 2

ext_signal.name: HCAL_HF_single_channel.v0
ext_signal.description: Checks for single channel energy above a threshold by using single time sample
ext_signal.label: HF/HO Tech.Trig

ext_signal.name: HCAL_HF_coincidence_PM.v2
ext_signal.description: Coincidence between any wedge in HF- and any wedge in HF+
ext_signal.label: HF/HO Tech.Trig

ext_signal.name: HCAL_HF_MMP_or_MPP.v1
ext_signal.description: Coincidence among any wedges with at least one in HF- and at least one in HF+
ext_signal.label: HF/HO Tech.Trig

ext_signal.name: HCAL_H0_totalOR.v0
ext_signal.description: HCAL: HO total OR
ext_signal.label: HF/HO Tech.Trig

ext_signal.name: BPTX_minus_postQuiet.v0
ext_signal.description: beam2 unpaired post quiet

ext_signal.name: BPTX_plus_postQuiet.v0
ext_signal.description: beam1 unpaired post quiet

ext_signal.name: TOTEM_RomanPotsOR
ext_signal.description: TOTEM_0: OR of the two Roman Pots

ext_signal.name: TOTEM_1
ext_signal.description: TOTEM_1

ext_signal.name: TOTEM_2
ext_signal.description: TOTEM_2

ext_signal.name: TOTEM_3
ext_signal.description: TOTEM_3

ext_signal.name: FSC_St1Sect45_upp.v0
ext_signal.description: FSC station 1, sector 45, upper

ext_signal.name: FSC_St1Sect45_down.v0
ext_signal.description: FSC station 1, sector 45, down
